description:
Learn to document the important moments of your life with a vibrant video record. This course will show you step by step: how to capture these moments using the iPad's HD camera; how to transfer the captures to your Macintosh computer and how to create a professional looking movie that your friends will be amazed at.

Use the iPad to capture the images "you want" in pristine high definition

  • Configure the app, FILMIC Pro to record how you see the world at the quality that you want

Transfer and process these large files into the high performance Macintosh environment

  • Memory and raw horsepower are so much greater than on the iPad

Follow alongside the instructor with the same video clips that are used in the projects

  • You don't just listen to the instructor in this course you follow along step by step at your pace

Create videos with titles, transitions and music that you can easily upload to your favorite sites

  • Upload your stunning videos to You Tube, Vimeo or Facebook !

This course is meant for all learners from beginners to advanced iPad or Macintosh users who may not have previously fully utilized the potential of iPad videography.
title: Using the iPad to Make Stunning HD Videos For All Learners
